title: Hellfire
creator_credit: John Coles, Marcus Viscidi and Mirage Enterprises
brief_description: This fictional drama is about a popular television evangelist, Reverend Woode, who believes that his interpretation of scripture holds the key to salvation. ‘Hellfire’ explores the controversies of contemporary religious doctrine and is a dynamic discussion tool for any group.
